message.text: why  am I getting the 404 error when I press the submit button on login page
how to change to light theme in eclipse

reply.text:
Use `Window > Preferences`:

1. Open Eclipse on Windows.  
2. Go to `Window` > `Preferences`.  
3. Navigate to `General` > `Appearance`.  
4. In the `Theme` dropdown choose `Light` (or `Classic` / `Default` depending on your Eclipse version).  
5. Click `Apply` or `Apply and Close`. Restart Eclipse if prompted.

If no light theme appears, you may have a theme plugin (e.g., DevStyle) forcing a dark theme â€” disable/uninstall that plugin via `Help` > `Eclipse Marketplace` or change its settings under `Window` > `Preferences` > `DevStyle`. To adjust editor colors separately, go to `Window` > `Preferences` > `Java` > `Editor` > `Syntax Coloring`.
